name: 维罗妮卡·隆
introduction: Veronica Long grew up in Houston, Texas (Go 'Stros!). She is a Kinder HSPVA alum, Young Arts Winner, University of Southern California grad, and is most known for her work in the TV series, Billy the Kid (MGM/EPIX), The Imperfects (Netflix), Charmed (The CW), Supernatural (The CW), Guadalajara (Amazon Prime). You can also see her many Hallmark and Lifetime movies, including Lights, Camera, Christmas!, Advice to Love By, Dying to Belong, A Winning Team, and more. Commercially, she's done national spots for Coca-Cola, Microsoft, T-Mobile, Lysol, Nissan, Amazon, NyQuil, etc. Her pride and joy is a comedy mockumentary series she created (wrote, directed, and stars in) called Vote for Janet. She lives in Vancouver, Canada and is currently going back and forth to Calgary, Canada to shoot an exciting recurring role on Billy the Kid (MGM/EPIX).
